entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as saying 'An Age Line!' and having glinting eyes. He is part of the group making their way across the Hall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being considered to try and get in by George.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as saying 'But I donâ€™t think anyone under seventeen will stand a chance'.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as saying 'Speak for yourself' and considering Harry to try and get in.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's insistence that nobody under seventeen should submit their name is mentioned.
